alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Misty Fjords; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 4:46AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...RAIN AND HIGH FREEZING LEVELS POSSIBLE THROUGH THE WEEK... Warmer temperatures with possible rain, or a mix of rain and snow are expected this week. As snow transitions to rain, or a mix, Monday, conditions will worsen, become very slippery, and promote ponding. Additional heavy snow on top of already deep snowpack on roof- tops and other structures, boats, and aircraft will become heavier as rain- soaked snow challenges load capability. Rain in higher terrain and higher freezing levels could also lead to a risk of nuisance flooding into next week. Finally, we are also concerned that an abrupt rise in temperatures and freezing levels could mean an increased risk of avalanches near steep terrain. While nuisance flooding could occur, no flooding of rivers and streams is expected.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Misty Fjords; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway
